original_title: Polytechnique: Ce qu’il reste du 6 décembre
overview: Made for the 30th anniversary of the Montréal massacre, Judith Plamondon’s documentary gives voice to the survivors and witnesses of the tragedy and is narrated by Karine Vanasse, actor and co-producer of Denis Villeneuve's 'Polytechnique' (2009).
title: Polytechnique: What Remains of December 6
